---
category: news
title: "Machine learning shows similar performance to traditional risk prediction models"
excerpt: "Some claim that machine learning technology has the potential to transform healthcare systems, but a study published by The BMJ finds that machine learning models have similar performance to traditional statistical models and share similar uncertainty in making risk predictions for individual patients."
